item.title: How to create a personal website using Quarto and Azure
item.dc:creator: Chad You
item.description:
Here are the basics about how to create a personal website using Quarto and Azure.

  1. Buy a domain on namecheap.com.

  2. Create a website project using Quarto.

  3. Publish your project to GitHub.

  4. Create a static web app using Azure Static Web Apps.

  5. Set up domain DNS in namecheap.com.
